pkgmetadata.longdescription: Tools to Manage a Parametric Function that Describes Phenology and More // Functions used to fit and test the phenology of species based on counts. Based on Girondot, M. (2010) doi:10.3354/esr00292 for the phenology function, Girondot, M. (2017) doi:10.1016/j.ecolind.2017.05.063 for the convolution of negative binomial, Girondot, M. and Rizzo, A. (2015) doi:10.2993/etbi-35-02-337-353.1 for Bayesian estimate, Pfaller JB, ..., Girondot M (2019) doi:10.1007/s00227-019-3545-x for tag-loss estimate, Hancock J, ..., Girondot M (2019) doi:10.1016/j.ecolmodel.2019.04.013 for nesting history, Laloe J-O, ..., Girondot M, Hays GC (2020) doi:10.1007/s00227-020-03686-x for aggregating several seasons.
